data.description:
Darts delivers exactly what a VR game should, an experience to remember.â€ - Thumb Culture, Thumb Culture Platinum Award

Play all your favorite Darts games: â€˜01 Series, Double Out â€˜01 Series, Count Up, and Cricket!

All skill levels welcome, with Easy and Medium aim assist to suit your throw! Plus, Hard Mode offers Pros the most realistic Darts experience in VR!

Pick from 65+ classic and fantasy designs to suit every dartist, each uniquely weighted in our custom physics engine for different throws and game strategies.

Explore 4 immersive halls: UK Pub, Mars, Beachside, & Vegas, with more coming soon!

Rock out to curated hall music or the YouTube-powered jukebox, with full multiplayer music!

+ 4 Halls
+ 65 Darts
+ 3 Levels of Aim Assist
+ 5 Challengeable NPC Pros in Each Hall
+ Pass and Play

ForeVR Darts v1.8 brings changes and improvements to the game, including our most-requested feature yet: MEDIA SHARE! 
 
WHATâ€™S NEW
ğŸ¯ YouTube Media Share! Learn more about it in our upcoming developer post.
ğŸ¯ Miscellaneous bug fixes and under-the-hood improvements 
 
YOUTUBE MEDIA SHARE!
You asked, we delivered! Now, the host in a multiplayer match has the option to share their media with the party. 
Please be aware that this feature is in early access, so weâ€™re still ironing out some flaws! Weâ€™re currently aware of some issues, like: 
- If an ad plays before a video, the video will be out-of-sync until the host changes the video
- Some text may clip out of buttons in certain languages
- When the host leaves a party *after* turning off media sharing, the remaining party members may experience issues turning on media share. This issue doesnâ€™t occur if the host doesnâ€™t turn off media sharing before leaving the party. 
 
SUPPORT
ğŸ¯ Found a bug, or experiencing an issue? Reach out to our team at help.forevrgames.com!

IMPROVEMENTS
ğŸ¯ Easy, Medium and Hard throw difficulties have been renamed to Full, Medium and No Assist.
ğŸ¯ Multiplayer stability improvements! 
ğŸ¯ NPC challenger throw speeds have been sped up.
ğŸ¯ Cricket overmark added.

ğŸ¯ Fixed! Resolved an issue where the room code number pad blocked the menu screen while seated.
ğŸ¯ Fixed! Resolved an issue where scoreboards became mixed when players joined late.
ğŸ¯ Fixed! Resolved an issue where scoreboard rounds appeared incorrect when players joined late.
ğŸ¯ Fixed! Resolved an issue where footpad locations appeared while not tilting the thumbstick.
ğŸ¯ Fixed! Corrected XP and Coin multipliers on the Main Menu screens.
ğŸ¯ Fixed! Resolved various localization translations.

ğŸ¯ Bug Fixes
ğŸ¯ Fixed issue where occasionally in multiplayer games, playersâ€™ scores will appear flipped (i.e. Player 2â€™s score will appear under player 1, and vice versa) on the scoreboard. 

Known Issues
ğŸ¯ When a player joins a room through the party menu, if that friend is in a different region, it will appear that the player joins a different room. If playing with friends in different regions, use Room Codes to avoid this issue! 
ğŸ¯ Weâ€™re implementing a hotfix very soon addressing these issues. 
ğŸ¯ If you run into any bugs (â€¦ other than Crickets ğŸ¦—), head to forevrgames.com/support!

----------------------------------------

Welcome to ForeVR Darts! ğŸ¯
We are so excited for you to play our game! Be sure to check out our favorite features:

ğŸ¯ Challenge an in-game NPC in solo play or while you wait for other players to join multiplayer matches
ğŸ¯ Play one of four game types: 101, 201, 301, or 501 single or double out
ğŸ¯ Level up in Pub Hall, Mars Hall, or Vegas Hall
ğŸ¯ Head to the Pro Shop and try out our 55 unique darts before you load up your personal arsenal
ğŸ¯ Create a Private Room to play with friends with Room Codes or make new friends in Public Matches
ğŸ¯ Pass and Play with family and friends at home
ğŸ¯ Rank up and track your best scores with in-game leaderboards.
ğŸ¯ Pop some Balloons to practice your throw and unlock achievements
ğŸ¯ Choose your own playlist at the jukebox

FOREVR VIPS:
ğŸ¯Five new exclusive darts for ForeVR VIP members
ğŸ¯Launch ForeVR Bowl from the main doorway
ğŸ¯How-to Score poster in the Pub Hall

Welcome to ForeVR Darts! ğŸ¯

We are so excited for you to play our game! Be sure to check out our favorite features:

 - Challenge an in-game NPC in solo play or while you wait for other players to join multiplayer matches
 - Play one of four game types: 101, 201, 301, or 501 single or double out
 - Level up in Pub Hall, Mars Hall, or Vegas Hall
 - Head to the Pro Shop and try out our 55 unique darts before you load up your personal arsenal
 - Create a Private Room to play with friends with Room Codes or make new friends in Public Matches.
 - Pass and Play with family and friends at home
 - Rank up and track your best scores with in-game leaderboards.

 - Choose your own playlist at the Jukebox
